articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Sports Equipment and Goods to Sports Teams
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Sports Equipment and Goods to Sports Teams 
						
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un sent sports equipment and goods to the sports teams. 
					 A ceremony of conveying them took place at Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Friday. 
					
					 Present there were Ri Yong Su, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Jong Mu, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, officials in the field of sports, players and coaches.

articles.title: Birthday Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Birthday Spread to Centenarian
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to centenarian Kim Pok Dong resident in Hyoksin-dong, Sariwon City of North Hwanghae Province. 
					 
					
					 She was subject to maltreatment and contempt as a member of stateless nation before the liberation of the country. She could lead a worthwhile life only after President Kim Il Sung liberated the country. 
					
					 She had worked hard for many years, true to the agricultural policy of the Workers' Party of Korea. Since she became a pensioner, she has produced a lot of meat and donated it to the country every year. 
					
					 She tells her children to devote themselves to the country, saying that she enjoys a long and healthy life thanks to the socialist system built and glorified by Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Leaves for Home
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Leaves for Home
						
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- The Chinese government economic and trade delegation headed by Li Jinzao, vice-minister of Commerce, left for home on Friday after attending the seventh meeting of the DPRK and China inter-governmental committee for cooperation in the economy, trade and science and technology.

articles.title: Pyongyang Citizens Indignant at S. Korean Regime's Anti-DPRK Moves
articles.content:
Pyongyang Citizens Indignant at S. Korean Regime's Anti-DPRK Moves
						
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Spokesmen for the DPRK National Defence Commission and the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued statements to rap the Lee Myung Bak regime in south Korea for frantically kicking up anti-DPRK confrontation and war moves from the outset of the year.
					 The statements evoked surging anger at the Lee regime among Pyongyang citizens.
					
					 Jong Sin Hyok, 55, a man living in Rangnang District, told KCNA:
					
					 "What the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors seeks in keying up the situation on the Korean Peninsula is to ignite a war on all accounts.
					
					 Since it took office in south Korea, the group has been utterly indifferent to removing the confrontation between the north and the south.
					
					 The DPRK does not want a war, but it will wipe out any invaders to the last one if they dare unleash a war."
					
					 Pak Song Chan, 40, a man living in Moranbong District, said:
					
					 "From the very day of its office, the Lee group of traitors has persisted in confrontation with fellow countrymen. Its desperate attempt to justify the confrontation policy, rejected by people at home and abroad, makes me sick.
					
					 Now I can hardly repress my urge to destroy the disgusting group of rats at once."
					
					 Kim Ok, 30, a woman living in Songyo District, said:
					
					 "The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un said in his New Year address that an important issue in putting an end to the division of the country and achieving its reunification is to remove confrontation between the north and the south.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should abandon their confrontation policy if they truly want peace on the Korean Peninsula."

articles.title: First Friday Labor This Year Done
articles.content:
First Friday Labor This Year Done
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Government employees in different parts of the DPRK did the first Friday labor this year on Jan. 11.
					 They sent at least 1 500 tons of compost to different co-op farms in a short span of time to assist agriculture, one of major fronts for economic construction this year.
					
					 Officials of different units including the Ministry of Forestry, Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports, Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and Mansudae Art Studio helped agricultural workers in the Wonro Vegetable Farm in Mangyongdae District in making preparations for this year's farming.
					
					 Officials of several units including the State Planning Commission, Ministry of Railways, Ministry of Land and Marine Transport and the Central Committee of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea unloaded compost and carried it to fields at the Rihyon Vegetable Co-op Farm in Sadong District.
					
					 Officials in those units including the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Ministry of Foreign Trade, Ministry of Agriculture and the Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House worked on fields of the Ryuhyon Vegetable Co-op Farm in Ryokpho District.

articles.title: Nano-based Agrochemicals Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Nano-based Agrochemicals Developed in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- The Agricultural Nano Technology Institute of the Academy of Agricultural Science of the DPRK has developed various kinds of nano-based agrochemicals.
					 The newly-developed nano germicide gives strong sterilizing effect on pathogens hindering the growth of paddy rice. Technology for producing the germicide at factories has already been developed.
					
					 The nano bio-growth stimulant helps speed up germination of rice seeds and early growth of rice seedlings and promote tillering. 
					
					 The nano bio-growth promoter produces a good effect on the growth of paddy rice by absorbing the far infrared rays in the water and changing its physicochemical quality.
					
					 The institute also developed nano photosynthetic accelerant, nano microelement compound and other nano-based functional agrochemicals, according to Choe Song Ryong, director of the Institute.

articles.title: "A-Match-for-A-Hundred", Slogan of KPA
articles.content:
"A-Match-for-A-Hundred", Slogan of KPA
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un in the New Year address said that this year marks the 50th anniversary of the slogan "a-match-for-a-hundred" advanced by the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung and it is important to bring about a fundamental change in strengthening the revolutionary armed forces and their combat preparedness.
					 The world's situation was very acute when President Kim Il Sung set forth the slogan for the Korean People's Army (KPA). After the Caribbean Crisis, the U.S. began directing the spearhead of aggression to Asia, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea in particular.
					
					 To cope with it, the President advanced a unique line of simultaneously speeding up the economic construction and the defence upbuilding and aroused all the people to that effect.
					
					 He also made frequent inspection tours of military units in the frontline areas to beef up the KPA.
					
					 When he visited a military post on Mt. Taedok on February 6, Juche 52 (1963), he underscored the need to turn positions into fortress with existing military personnel, intensify military trainings and firmly arm all servicepersons with the revolutionary idea so as to prepare all of them to be "a-match-for-a-hundred" combatants.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il made big efforts to carry the slogan into practice among servicepersons. His energetic guidance turned the KPA to be an invincible army.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Patriotism Inspires DPRK People in Building Thriving Nation
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Patriotism Inspires DPRK People in Building Thriving Nation
						
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, in his New Year address said that Kim Jong Il's patriotism is the eternal soul and breath of Kim Il Sung's nation and a driving force for the building of a thriving country.
					 In his lifetime leader Kim Jong Il devoted his all to the prosperity of the country and happiness of its people with ardent love for them. Kim Jong Il's patriotism calls for regarding every blade of grass and tree of the country as one's own flesh and blood. This patriotism based on love and devotion requires anyone to respond in action, not by word, to the call of the country and the people.
					
					 Inspired by Kim Jong Il's patriotism, the Korean army and people made a dynamic onward march for carrying into practice his plan and behests last year.
					
					 They successfully launched the satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2, fully displaying the high-level space science and technology and overall national strength of Juche Korea. They also made a breakthrough on all major fronts for building a thriving country with the mettle of "At a go". 
					
					 Solid material and technological foundations were laid for the development of the national economy and a number of monumental edifices built in different parts of the country to renew its looks.
					
					 The fact evidently proves that Kim Jong Il's patriotism is a powerful driving force for the final victory in building a thriving socialist country. 
					
					 With this patriotism, the army and people of the DPRK will devote all their patriotic zeal and wisdom to the prosperity of the socialist country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Displaying Might of Great Harmonious Whole
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Displaying Might of Great Harmonious Whole 
						
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday in an editorial calls upon all people to fully display the great traits of harmonious whole which proudly brought about a great victory of the nation noteworthy in the history of the country and dynamically pave a wide avenue for a final victory of the great Paektusan nation.
					 The editorial goes on:
					
					 The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un is now standing at the helm of the Korean revolution. 
					
					 The ideology and social system and the cause of the DPRK are winning victory after victory and the prospect of the revolution is bright as the tradition of the harmonious whole rooted in Mt. Paektu is firmly preserved and the center of unity and leadership is great. 
					
					 The harmonious whole between Kim Jong Un and all service personnel and people has become purer and stronger since the nation deeply grieved over the passing of leader Kim Jong Il, a great loss to it. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un injected rays and warmth of the sun into the hearts of all people and encouraged them to rise from sorrow. His august name and image serve as a great banner redoubling the strength and courage of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The harmonious whole of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the army and people of the DPRK is the most solid unity as it was formed with single mind and it is getting stronger with their sense of obligation. It serves as a banner helping carry forward the high dignity and leadership authority of the WPK down through generations. 
					
					 Now all servicepersons and people of the DPRK long to see Kim Jong Un whether they are close to him or far away from him. They entrust their destiny and future entirely to him, looking up to him in pleasant or difficult days. 
					
					 Once the leader is determined, all people turn out as one to unconditionally carry out his instruction and they trust and follow the WPK like their real mother. That is why the WPK remains undeterred in any storm and stress. 
					
					 The harmonious whole of the WPK and the revolutionary ranks serve as a powerful driving force for defending the socialist country and building a thriving nation. 
					
					 All people should fully demonstrate the exploits performed in winning a great victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and glorify them forever and exalt the invincible dignity and spirit of the great Paektusan nation this year greeting the 65th anniversary of the DPRK and the 60th anniversary of the victory in the war.

articles.title: Respect for North-South Joint Declarations and Their Implementation Called for
articles.content:
Respect for North-South Joint Declarations and Their Implementation Called for
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- It is a basic prerequisite for advancing the inter-Korean relations and accelerating the reunification of the country to respect the north-south joint declarations and implement them.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration serve as great programmes for reunification common to the nation in the new century and milestones for peace and prosperity as they paved a wide avenue for realizing the reconciliation and unity of all Koreans by developing the north-south relations.
					
					 Whether one respects or denies the north-south declarations and whether one implements them or not is basic criteria to distinguish reunification from division and patriotism from treachery.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea brought the inter-Korean relations, which had developed favorably under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration, back to those in the confrontation era. These moves for escalating confrontation are intolerable as they are acts of treachery quite contrary to the basic spirit of the north-south joint declarations and the aspiration of the fellow countrymen for reunification.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations cannot be a plaything of the anti-reunification forces any longer. The confrontation between compatriots must be terminated as soon as possible.
					
					 In order to remove the confrontation between the north and south and dynamically advance the reunification movement, all Koreans at home and abroad should positively support the joint declarations and turn out as one in the nationwide struggle to preserve and implement them.
					
					 They should never allow any attempt at shunning and opposing the implementation of the declarations.
					
					 The DPRK remains unchanged in its stand to achieve national unity, independent reunification, peace and prosperity on the basis of the declarations.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Dismisses Remarks of Chongwadae's Diplomatic and Security Chief
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Dismisses Remarks of Chongwadae's Diplomatic and Security Chief 
						
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- The Korean nation has drawn a conclusion in the light of the prevailing situation that it is urgent to eliminate the worst confrontation maniacs as soon as possible for improving the north-south ties and reunifying the country 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a bylined commentary blasting south Korean chief for diplomacy and security Chon Yong U's reckless remarks calling for escalating confrontation.
					
					 Chon talked about "the situation inside the north", a revelation of his sinister expectation towards sort of "changes" in the DPRK, notes the commentary, terming it a nonsense that can be talked only by confrontation maniac.
					
					 The south Korean group of traitors has been taken aback by the Korean people's intense loyalty and noble moral obligation, the unbreakable single-minded unity of the party, the army and the people and its invincible might, says the commentary, adding:
					
					 However, traitor Chon Yong U is persisting in his spate of vituperation against the DPRK.
					
					 He was foolish enough to assert "the south has power to decide the north's future". Great irony is that such colonial stooges are bluffing though they cannot exist even a moment without backing and patronage of foreign forces.
					
					 The jargons let loose by Chon about "May 24 step" and "sanctions against the north", lost to shame, are aimed at prodding the next regime into invariably pursuing the anti-reunification "policy towards the north".
					
					 All facts once again clearly indicate that the Lee group of traitors including Chon is the worst confrontation maniacs and stumbling block lying in the way of reunification as they refuse to give up their bad habit of stoking confrontation with compatriots before going to their graves.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage Field Tactical Drill in Forefront Areas
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage Field Tactical Drill in Forefront Areas
						
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- The 26th Division of the south Korean ground force is planning to stage a large-scale field tactical drill in Yangju, Tongduchon, Phochon and Ryonchon in Kyonggi Province and in Cholwon of south Korean Kangwon Province from Jan. 14 to 18, south Korean Yonhap News reported.
					 The madcap war maneuver to be staged in the forefront areas with huge military hardware and forces involved reveals the true colors of the warmongers keen to realize their scenario for invading the north.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers to Stage Large-Scale Mobile Drill
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers to Stage Large-Scale Mobile Drill
						
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- The "capital motorized infantry division" of the south Korean puppet army was reported to stage a large-scale mobile drill in the areas of Phochon and Ryonchon of Kyonggi Province and Cholwon of south Korean Kangwon Province from Jan. 14 to 18 and from Jan. 28 to Feb. 1, said Yonhap News of south Korea Thursday.
					 A series of reckless war exercises to be staged by the war maniacs in forefront areas are rendering the situation on the Korean Peninsula tenser.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drill to Be Staged
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drill to Be Staged 
						
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- The U.S. marines stationed in Okinawa and the Marine Corps of south Korea are contemplating staging joint winter drills, the first of their kind in history, in Phohang in North Kyongsang Province and in Phyongchang, south Korean Kangwon Province, for about four weeks from February. 
					 It was reported that they would have a mobile exercise, firing and blasting drills and a drill for survival under various conditions.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Regime Accused of Bedeviling Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Regime Accused of Bedeviling Inter-Korean Relations
						
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Son Hyong Gun, chairman of the Federation of South Koreans in Japan for Democracy and Unification, released an article on Jan. 1.
					 The article accused the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea of having pursued a hostile policy toward the DPRK over the past five years, bedeviling the south-north relations.
					
					 It condemned the Lee regime for totally denying the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and standing in the way of implementing them, in particular.
					
					 An opposition to the south-north joint declarations would only result in sparking confrontation, it said.
					
					 It urged the south Korean authorities to express their will to implement the declarations at an early date, set free reunification champions from prisons and abolish the "Security Law" aimed at cracking down on the pro-reunification organizations.
					
					 It said that the federation would wage a dynamic reunification movement centering around All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration and lift voices for having a peace treaty concluded on the Korean Peninsula this year which marks the 60th anniversary of the signing of the Armistice Agreement.
					
					 It called for further intensifying the solidarity actions for opposing Japan's moves for national discrimination policy and the revival of militarism, normalizing the DPRK-Japan relations and settling the issue related to sexual slavery for the imperial Japanese Army.

articles.title: Abolition of Fascist Law and Release of Prisoners of Conscience Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Abolition of Fascist Law and Release of Prisoners of Conscience Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- The Family Movement for Realizing Democracy in south Korea held a Thursday meeting in Seoul on Jan. 3 at which it demanded the repeal of the "Security Law." 
					 At the meeting speakers accused the "government" of still keeping the SL, a copy of the "Maintenance of the Public Order Act" enforced by the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 The authorities have recently intensified the suppression of progressive forces such as searching and investigating members of the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, elders for national reunification and members of the reunification movement organizations, they charged.
					
					 They vowed to intensify the actions for having the SL, the law against the nation, reunification, democracy and human rights, abolished and prisoners of conscience released.

articles.title: Violence Rampant at S. Korean Schools
articles.content:
Violence Rampant at S. Korean Schools 
						
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Violence rampant at south Korean schools has become a serious social problem.
					 On Jan. 7 an institution concerned made public results of a survey conducted among more than 11 000 students of 98 primary, secondary and high schools in Seoul.
					
					 According to them, 41.8 percent of the respondents said they were subject to violence at schools and 39.8 percent noted they attempted  suicide, harassed by the ever-worsening violence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in France
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in France
						
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let's Dynamically Struggle for a Final Victory, Holding Aloft the Banner of Songun" was brought out in booklet by the Democrate Publishing House of France.
					 The work, a speech made on April 15, 2012, says the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proves the truth that outstanding leaders assure the dignity and prosperity of the country and nation.
					
					 Clarified in the work is an idea that the Korean People's Army, which registered one victory after another, has assured the glorious 100-year history of Juche Korea and this provided a sure guarantee for the eternal history of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 It sets forth the tasks to be fulfilled to demonstrate the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carry out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 A book releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on Jan. 5.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by Mongolian TV
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by Mongolian TV 
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- MNCTV of Mongolia showed the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un paying high tribute to Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun and making the New Year Address.
					 Kim Jong Un made the New Year Address to the Korean people on the New Year 2013, the TV said, and went on:
					
					 He in his address referred in detail to the issues of building a thriving nation, achieving Korean reunification, etc.
					
					 He fully displayed his political caliber in the past one year.
					
					 The successful launch of satellite in the DPRK indicated that he has creditably carried forward the cause of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Many media of the world including publications of hostile countries admired his political caliber, selecting him as a man of the year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Lauded in Peru, Ecuador
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Lauded in Peru, Ecuador
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Public organizations and an institution of Peru and Ecuador made public statements on Dec. 26 and 27 last year to mark the first anniversary of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said in a statement that Kim Jong Un has advanced the cause of Juche and the cause of socialism triumphantly with his will to consistently pursue the Songun politics and his ever-victorious Songun leadership.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 He unfolded a new chapter for the cause of immortalizing the leader and wisely led the refurbishment of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun.
					
					 He formulated the revolutionary ideas and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and Kim Jong Il's patriotism and clarified his invariable will to pursue the Songun politics in a series of speeches and works published at the celebration of the Day of the Sun and the banquet given on August 25, the anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 We extend warm congratulations to KPA Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, who is praised as a worldwide leader and the most famous man and sincerely wish him good health and the Korean people peace and prosperity.
					
					 Kim Jong Il Library of Ecuador and the Ecuadorian Group of the Young Soldiers of Juche said in a joint statement:
					
					 Kim Jong Un made miraculous achievements unprecedented in the history of the world revolution by successfully leading KPA and the Korean people in the past one year.
					
					 Under his leadership the Korean people successfully launched satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2, thoroughly carrying out the desire and behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He is highly praised by the world for his outstanding leadership ability and undying feats.

articles.title: Swiss, British Organizations Support Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
articles.content:
Swiss, British Organizations Support Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
						
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Swiss and British organizations issued joint statements on Jan. 1 in support of the New Year Address made by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in their joint statement said that Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address referred to the issues of building a thriving country and achieving its reunification.
					
					 The statement expressed belief that the year 2013 would shine as a year of proud victory and glory for the DPRK.
					
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association expressed full support to the address, noting it advanced the correct line and policy for fresh victory this year, clearly indicating the way of achieving Korea's reunification and building a thriving country and instilling into the world people conviction of the cause of global independence.
					
					 The Stoke-on-Trent Branch of the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in its statement on Jan. 3 fully supported the address, saying that rosy is the prospect of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of global independence thanks to Kim Jong Un's leadership.

articles.title: Foreign Personages Support Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
articles.content:
Foreign Personages Support Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
						
 Pyongyang, January 11 (KCNA) -- Personages of Sweden and Slovenia made public statements on Jan. 3 and 4 in support of the New Year Address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 Oskar Molleby, chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his address reviewed the achievements made in the DPRK last year and set forth tasks for building a thriving socialist nation this year.
					
					 He in his address called for effecting a decisive turn in building an economic giant and improving the people's living standard in 2013 with the same spirit with which Koreans manufactured and launched an application satellite of Juche, demonstrating the dignity and might of Songun Korea.
					
					 Saying that the success in economic construction should be manifested in the aspect of improving the standard of people's living, he underscored the need to direct great efforts to bolstering up the sectors and units that have a direct bearing on the people's livelihoods, and increasing production there.
					
					 His New Year Address gives conviction and hope for victory to not only the Korean people striving to build thriving socialism of Juche but the world progressive people aspiring after independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Slovenia-DPRK Friendship Association expressed full support for the part of New Year Address dealing with Korea's reunification, noting:
					
					 Kim Jong Un said that the reunification of the country is the greatest national task that brooks no further delay and was the lifelong desire and instructions of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He stressed that in order to achieve the reunification of the country it is necessary to remove confrontation between the north and the south, thoroughly implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and solve the reunification issue by concerted efforts of the Korean nation in an independent manner.
					
					 All Koreans should resolutely reject domination and interference of foreign forces and their aggression and war moves and never allow any act of hindering Korea's reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia equipos a los conjuntos deportivos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia equipos a los conjuntos deportivos
						
Pyongyang, 11 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 11 en el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang la ceremonia de entrega de equipos de ejercicio enviados por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un a los conjuntos deportivos.
					En la ocasion participaron el jefe de departamento del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Ri Yong Su, el ministro de Deportes Ri Jong Mu y otros funcionarios, jugadores y entrenadores.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mesa de alimentos a Kim Pok Dong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mesa de alimentos a Kim Pok Dong
						
Pyongyang, 11 de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio la mesa de alimentos a la centenaria Kim Pok Dong, moradora del barrio de Hyoksin de la ciudad de Sariwon de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte.
					Nacida antes de la liberacion de la patria vivia en medio de maltrato y desprecio, pero ha vivido felizmente desde cuando el Presidente Kim Il Sung libero el pais.
					
					Ella trabajo con sinceridad para materializar la politica agricola del Partido y tambien despues de jubilada produjo cada ano gran cantidad de carne para donarla al pais.
					
					Siempre decia a sus descendientes que gracias al regimen socialista establecido y glorificado por el Presidente y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il ella misma vive hasta cien anos y les encomendo encarecidamente que hagan muchos trabajos para el pais.

articles.title: Funcionarios publicos realizan el primer trabajo de viernes del ano
articles.content:
Funcionarios publicos realizan el primer trabajo de viernes del ano
						
Pyongyang, 11 de enero (ACNC) -- Los funcionarios de ministerios y organos centrales de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea realizaron hoy el primer trabajo de viernes de este ano.
					Para apoyar a la rama agricola, uno de los sectores principales de la construccion economica de este ano, ellos prepararon en un corto plazo mas de mil 500 toneladas de estiercol.
					
					Los funcionarios del Ministerio de Silvicultura, el Ministerio de Deportes, el Comite Central del Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, la Casa de Creacion Mansudae y otras unidades acudieron a la Granja Especializada en Verduras de Wonro del capitalino municipio de Mangyongdae para ayudar a los agricultores enfrascados en los preparativos de faenas agricolas de este ano.
					
					Otros del Comite Estatal de Planificacion, el Ministerio del Ferrocarril y el Ministerio de Transporte Terrestre y Maritimo, el Comite Central de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea y otras entidades transportaron estiercol a las parcelas en la Granja Cooperativa Especializada en Verduras de Rihyon del capitalino municipio de Sadong.
					
					Los funcionarios del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores, el Ministerio de Comercio Exterior, el Ministerio de Agricultura, la Editora del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y otras instituciones trabajaron en la Granja Cooperativa Especializada en Verduras de Ryuhyon del capitalino municipio de Ryokpho.

articles.title: Capitalinos denuncian campana conflictiva de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Capitalinos denuncian campana conflictiva de Sur de Corea
						
Pyongyang, 11 de enero (ACNC) -- Los capitalinos condenan fuertemente a la banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak que se enfrasca en la confrontacion fratricida.
					Informados de las declaraciones del portavoz del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el Comite de Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria, los pyongyaneses no ocultan su indignacion.
					
					El morador del municipio de Raknang Jong Sin Hyok (55 anos de edad) dijo a la ACNC que la camarilla de Lee trata de estallar a toda costa la guerra en este territorio al exacerbar la situacion y prosiguio:
					
					La banda de Lee no penso ni una vez en aliviar el estado de confrontacion entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					No deseamos la guerra, pero si los agresores se atreven a atacarnos, eliminaremos a todos los enemigos.
					
					El morador del municipio de Moran, Pak Song Chan (40 anos de edad) senalo.
					
					Desde el primer dia de  su mandato, la horda de Lee ha venido recurriendo a la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					No puedo ocultar indignacion ante las maniobras siniestras de la banda ratonesca tendentes a justificar su politica conflictiva y mantenerla de continuo. 
					
					Tengo ganas de aniquilar ahora mismo a aquellos imbeciles repugnantes.
					
					La moradora del municipio de Songyo, Kim Ok, (30 anos de edad) recalco que como indico el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en su mensaje del Ano Nuevo, lo importante en lograr la reunificacion de la patria es aliviar el estado de confrontacion intercoreana.
					
					Agrego que si las autoridades surcoreanas aprecian de veras a su nacion y desean la paz, deben abandonar su politica de enfrentamiento fratricida.
